name: AS_GCM_IBRValidationDisabled_v1_default
sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: This rule represents whether or not Include By Reference (IBR) clauses would fail validation if the clause has a fill-in.

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: true() - IBR Clauses would not fail validation due to a fill-in


CUSTOMIZATION STEPS:

1. Replace the true value with false to Enable IBR validation

2. The value of this expression should only be one of the two available below

EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Boolean with the value of true or false

*/
true()
